data.name: Death Blonde
data.detailed_description:
Death Blonde is an online multiplayer racing arena shooter.
Join a world of cursed skeletons with cool sunglasses. Isn't that enough for you? Let's also put in cars, drifts, weapons, explosions, and heavy-metal-electronic music, maybe that's more what you're looking for.

Turn on your car and fight in the arena.
You will be able to equip different weapons, drop explosive crates, or shove your opponents to extremely dangerous places. Find your way to play and outlive your opponents.

Grab your skeleton and fight in the arena modes.
Choose if yours is a personal matter or join your friends in the team battle. Still not enough for you? Challenge your luck against the hordes of enemies that will arrive, will you be able to beat the exterminators?

Features:
- Multiplayer online up to 10 players.
- Wide range of classic fps weapons, choose between machine gun, shotgun, plasma, rocket launcher and much more.
- Variety of arena types with different shapes and sizes.
- Huge choice of game modes: free-for-all, team, big battle and more.
- Cyber psychedelic cel shaded graphics boosted beyond all limits.
- Full controller support.

data.short_description: Death Blonde is an online multiplayer racing arena shooter. Join a world of cursed skeletons with cool sunglasses. Isn't that enough for you? Let's also put in cars, drifts, weapons, explosions, and heavy-metal-electronic music, maybe that's more what you're looking for.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2nd generation Core i3, AMD A6, or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT, AMD 5670, Intel HD 3000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller is required for multiplayer battles
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SM4 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
